definitions.description: Significant milestones in a customer's personal life which can impact their financial situation, such as attending college, marriage, having a child, retirement, etc.

constantValues: Significant milestones in a customer's personal life which can impact their financial situation, such as attending college, marriage, having a child, retirement, etc.
